hero.text:
An Interactive map of Ukraine with the display and the possibility of buying NFT-art, which depicts the main symbols of the largest cities of Independent Ukraine with historical descriptions. We treat history with care, strive for enlightenment, and popularize web3 in our Rídne Misto.

All money goes to aid funds for Ukraine.

step1KYiv.title: Independent Kyiv
step1KYiv.text:
Kyiv is the heart of Ukraine. A majestic city where history itself tells you its chronicles. 
From the time when three brothers Kiy, Shchek and Khoryv and their sister Lybid founded the city and named it Kyiv, in honor of their older brother, a lot of water has already flowed from the Dnipro. But it is still a city of glory and pride of the entire Ukrainian nation 
If you have not seen this ancient and at the same time eternally young and modern capital, you should definitely do it. And fall in love with it forever!

step1Donetsk.title: Unbreakable Donetsk
step1Donetsk.text:
The Wild Fields is a no man’s land. A place near the Kalmius River through which many peoples passed — Cimmerians, Scythians, Sarmatians, Goths, Tatars, Slavs...
Donetsk was one of the most powerful centers of industry and innovative development. But at the same time it was also a- place of science, art and sports. A city of mines, factories, combines, but also a city of million roses, ballet, football and gymnastics. This is the legacy of the majestic and unconquered Wild Fields.

step2.title: Choose which fund the money will go to:

hospitallers.title: Hospitallers
hospitallers.description: "Hospitallers" is a volunteer organization of paramedics.

comeBackAlive.title: Come Back Alive
comeBackAlive.description: "Come Back Alive" one the biggest organization providing support to the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

serhiyPritulaFoundation.title: Serhiy Pritula Foundation
serhiyPritulaFoundation.description: "Serhiy Pritula Foundation" help combat units (ZSU, NMU, SBGS, Territorial Defense Forces)

childrensStories.title: Children’s stories
childrensStories.description: "Children’s stories" foundation that helps with psychological and psychosocial support to children who suffered as a result of war operations.

tbilisiVolunteers.title: Tbilisi Volunteers
tbilisiVolunteers.description: "Tbilisi Volunteers" help tUkrainian refugees ended up in Georgia get medicines, medical care, temporary housing and information
